Class com.icl.saxon.GroupRenderer 

java.lang.Object

                   +----com.icl.saxon.GroupRenderer
public class GroupRenderer
extends ElementCopier
Class GroupRenderer()

A general-purpose element handler for processing a sequence of elements of the same type.

GroupRenderer(String, String, String)
Constructor initialises default actions.

afterGroup(ElementInfo)
After a group of one or more consecutive elements, output the registered "after" string
beforeGroup(ElementInfo)
Before a group of one or more consecutive elements, output the registered "before" string
endElement(ElementInfo)
After an element, output nothing
startElement(ElementInfo)
Before an element, output the registered "between" string if this is not the first element of a group

GroupRenderer 
 public GroupRenderer(String before,
                      String between,
                      String after)
Constructor initialises default actions.

Parameters:
before - String to be output before a group of one or more elements
between - String to be output between adjacent elements
after - String to be output after a group of one or more elements

 public void beforeGroup(ElementInfo e) throws SAXException
Before a group of one or more consecutive elements, output the registered "before" string
